sentences.en: Adolescence is the period of progression from childhood to adulthood.
sentences.cn: 青春期是由童年到成年的过渡期.

sentences.en: Adolescence is the period of transition between childhood and adulthood.
sentences.cn: 青春期是童年与成年之间的过渡时期.

sentences.en: Both solitary cysts and polycystic disease are usually not discovered until adulthood.
sentences.cn: 不论是孤立囊肿或囊病通常在成年时期才被发现.

sentences.en: Few people nowadays are able to maintain friendships into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 现今很少有人能够把友谊维持到成年。

sentences.en: He is on the threshold of adulthood.
Human sexual development does not end with adolescence, but continues in adulthood.
sentences.cn: 人的性行为发展不会随着青春期的过去而结束, 而会持续到成人期.

sentences.en: Hypochondriasis usually first manifests itself in early adulthood andamong males and females.
sentences.cn: 疑病症通常在刚进入成年时期时开始表现出来,男性和女性的比例相近.

sentences.en: Intimacy versus isolation is the central issue of young adulthood.
sentences.cn: 我认为是与孤独相对的亲密是孩童时代的中心问题.

sentences.en: It is said to be characteristic of adolescence and early adulthood.
sentences.cn: 它被认为是青春期或成年期初期所特有的现象.

sentences.en: Looking back as they approach adulthood, those moments were the most precious.
sentences.cn: 在孩子们渐渐长大之际回想过去, 那些时刻才是最珍贵的.

sentences.en: Music is full of my life from the childhood to adulthood.
sentences.cn: 它陪伴我度过我的童年,青年和成年时期.

sentences.en: No dog ever put on a hundred pounds after reaching adulthood.
sentences.cn: 狗成年后体重不会增加上百磅.

sentences.en: Some infantile actions survive into adulthood.
sentences.cn: 某些婴儿期的行为一直保持到成年期.

sentences.en: There are no insights that reflect someone on the verge of adulthood.
sentences.cn: 他的视角仍是属于儿童的.

trans.tran_en: the time when you are an adult
